1111734963798458369.text:
The SEC has extended its deadlines to approve or deny the Bitwise and VanEck bitcoin ETF proposals to May 16 and May 21, 2019.  The SEC can, and almost certainly will, delay both ETF proposals two more times.

The SEC's *final* deadlines will be October 13 and  October 18, 2019.

1098239189320126464.text:
The clock is running on the new Bitwise & VanEck bitcoin ETF proposals. The SEC's current deadlines are April 1 for Bitwise & April 6 for VanEck. 

Remember, the SEC can & likely will delay up to three times. The absolute final deadlines to watch are October 13 & 18 respectively.
